text: @realDonaldTrump With the Covid-19 infections/deaths in US rising Trump downplayed importance of maintaining social distancing measures in face of economic losses.“We cannot let cure be worse than problem,” he said “Our country wasn’t built to be shut down normal life will resume soon,” he said.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
